purpose: Facilitates the development of applications using large language models by providing a structured framework.
principle: Builds on Python with integrations for large language models like GPT-4 and frameworks like LangChain for agent development.
reusability: Designed for easy integration with existing Python projects, supports modular development of language agents.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may lack comprehensive documentation and robustness for production use.
name: promptulate
